_comment: diameter: the longest range (long diameter) of particle centers Da-d=2ad
aspectRatio: Aspect ratio of the elliptical cylinder. lambda=a/b
mode:either compression or expansion--compression: fix hard sphere diameter=1 and compressing the axial length; expansion: fix the axial length and swelling particles
z: axial length under Expansion mode
transMax: maximal translational move in one step
radMax: maximal radial move. Set value <=0 then all particles are confined on the boundary
maxIters: maximal iteration SLP steps. LPClass.optimize will return 1 if maxIters is reached
termTol: terminate criterion. SLP will terminate if the compression is below this value
NNLextraDist: the extra distance tolerated for building neighbor list
